speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Dave from XYZ Collections. I need to discuss your overdue account. Can you verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, I got that. Now, can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thanks. You owe us $250. Here's the thing, you need to pay it now, or else.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I need to discuss my options first.

speaker: Agent
text: Options? What options? You can either pay up or get the hell out of here with your excuses!

speaker: Customer
text: I assure you, I’m trying to resolve this as best as I can.

speaker: Agent
text: Trying to resolve it? You think this is a joke? Pay your damn bill or face the consequences!

speaker: Customer
text: I’m here to discuss a payment plan. Please, let’s work together on this.

speaker: Agent
text: Work together? You think I have time for this crap? Just give me your credit card info!

speaker: Customer
text: I can't give any information until we reach a reasonable agreement.

speaker: Agent
text: You know what? I don’t have time for this nonsense. Either pay or I’m done with you!

speaker: Customer
text: I will speak with my lawyer if necessary, but I prefer to settle this amicably.

speaker: Agent
text: Good luck with that! Just don’t come crying to me when you end up in deeper shit!
